verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are now the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and this is the <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of them that went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me from <S%H4480>Babylon,<s%> <S%H894><s%> in the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas;<s%> <S%H1648>Gershom:<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar;<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel:<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> <S%H2407>Hattush.<s%>

Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah,<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H6551>Pharosh;<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah:<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of the <S%H2145>males<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H6355>Pahath-moab;<s%> <S%H454>Elihoenai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2228>Zerahiah,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah;<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3166>Jahaziel,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> also of <S%H5720>Adin;<s%> <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H5867>Elam;<s%> <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6271>Athaliah,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah;<s%> <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3097>Joab;<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H8019>Shelomith;<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3131>Josiphiah,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H893>Bebai;<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H893>Bebai,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H5803>Azgad;<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6997>Hakkatan,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And of the last <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H314><s%> of <S%H140>Adonikam,<s%> whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are <S%H428>these,<s%> <S%H467>Eliphelet,<s%> <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> and <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> them <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> also of <S%H902>Bigvai;<s%> <S%H5793>Uthai,<s%> and <S%H2072>Zabbud,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> them <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And I gathered them <S%H6908>together<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> that <S%H935>runneth<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H163>Ahava;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> abode we in <S%H2583>tents<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> and I <S%H995>viewed<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

Then <S%H7971>sent<s%> I for <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> for <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> for <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and for <S%H494>Elnathan,<s%> and for <S%H3402>Jarib,<s%> and for <S%H494>Elnathan,<s%> and for <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and for <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and for <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> chief <S%H7218>men;<s%> also for <S%H3114>Joiarib,<s%> and for <S%H494>Elnathan,<s%> men of <S%H995>understanding.<s%>

And I sent them with <S%H6680>commandment<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H112>Iddo<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3703>Casiphia,<s%> and I <S%H7760>told<s%> <S%H6310><s%> them <S%H1697>what<s%> they should <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H112>Iddo,<s%> and to his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H5411>Nethinims,<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3703>Casiphia,<s%> that they should <S%H935>bring<s%> unto us <S%H8334>ministers<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

And by the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us they <S%H935>brought<s%> us a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7922>understanding,<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen;<s%> <S%H6240><s%>

And <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty;<s%>

Also <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5411>Nethinims,<s%> <S%H7945>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> had <S%H5414>appointed<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5411>Nethinims:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them were <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Then I <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> a <S%H6685>fast<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H163>Ahava,<s%> that we might afflict <S%H6031>ourselves<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> him a <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> for us, and for our little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H7399>substance.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I was <S%H954>ashamed<s%> to <S%H7592>require<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a band of <S%H2428>soldiers<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> us against the <S%H4480>enemy<s%> <S%H341><s%> in the <S%H1870>way:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we had <S%H559>spoken<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them for <S%H2896>good<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> him; but his <S%H5797>power<s%> and his <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> him.
So we <S%H6684>fasted<s%> and <S%H1245>besought<s%> our <S%H4480>God<s%> <S%H430><s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H2063>this:<s%> and he was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> of us.

Then I <S%H914>separated<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> of the <S%H4480>chief<s%> <S%H8269><s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> of their <S%H4480>brethren<s%> <S%H251><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them,

And <S%H8254>weighed<s%> unto <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> even the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> which the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and his <S%H3289>counselors,<s%> and his <S%H8269>lords,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> there <S%H4672>present,<s%> had offered: <S%H7311><s%>

I even <S%H8254>weighed<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and of <S%H2091>gold<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents;<s%>

Also <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3713>basins<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H150>drams;<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H6668>fine<s%> <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5178>copper,<s%> <S%H2530>precious<s%> as <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H859>Ye<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%> also; and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> are a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Watch <S%H8245><s%> ye, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> them, <S%H5704>until<s%> ye <S%H8254>weigh<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> in the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So <S%H6901>took<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then we <S%H5265>departed<s%> from the <S%H4480>river<s%> <S%H5104><s%> of <S%H163>Ahava<s%> on the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us, and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> us from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and of such as lay in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
And we <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3427>abode<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Now on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas;<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> them was <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> and <S%H5129>Noadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1131>Binnui,<s%> <S%H3881>Levites;<s%>
By <S%H4557>number<s%> and by <S%H4948>weight<s%> of every <S%H3605>one:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> was <S%H3789>written<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

Also the <S%H1121>children<s%> of those that had been carried <S%H1473>away,<s%> which were <S%H935>come<s%> out of the <S%H4480>captivity,<s%> <S%H7628><s%> <S%H7126>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> he <S%H6842>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> this was a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1881>commissions<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H323>lieutenants,<s%> and to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>river:<s%> and they <S%H5375>furthered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
